title: Upgrading App (Retaining Feature Access/Settings)
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the current Store build version installed from Google Play
And the user has logged in with an entitled account
And the user has set Favorite Team(s)
custom_steps:
When the user logs in to Google Play with a whitelisted account
And updates to the new version available in Alpha
And launches the app
custom_expected:
Then the user's login information will be retained
And the user's feature access will be retained
And the user's Favorite Teams will be retained
And the user's notification settings will be retained

title: 10 AM Scoreboard Flip (Before 10am)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on an Android device with At Bat and the device date is the current date before 10am EST
custom_steps:
When the user opens At Bat
and taps on Scoreboard
custom_expected: Then the Scoreboard will show the previous day's games

custom_steps_separated.content: when the device date is current date before 10am
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Scoreboard will show the previous day's games

custom_steps_separated.content: when the device date is current date after 10am
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Scoreboard will show the current day's games

title: 10 AM Scoreboard Flip (After 10am)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on an Android device with At Bat and the device date is current date after 10am
custom_steps: When the user opens At Bat and taps on Scoreboard
custom_expected: Then the Scoreboard will show the current day's games

title: Audio Feed
custom_preconds:
Given the user has an entitled account
Given there is a game that is in the Live state and an audio feed that is MEDIA_ON

Note: For off-season testing, audio feeds will not be available.  As a workaround, load the STB apk file onto a tablet so you can use the proxy to change the date ranges in the config file
custom_steps: When the user launches an audio feed
custom_expected: Then the audio feed should play

title: Scoreboard Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
The user has an MLB.TV Entitled Account
And the user is on the Scoreboard Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN
The user clicks on the game and selects one of the game feeds
custom_expected:
THEN
The user should be able to see the game feed

title: Video Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
The user has an MLB.TV Entitled Account
And the user is on the Videos Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN
The user selects one of the VOD content
custom_expected:
THEN
The user will be shown the VOD content

title: Condensed Game or Game Recap
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
The user has an MLB.TV Entitled Account
And the user is on the Scoreboard Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN
The user selects a game in its Final State to play a Recap or Condensed Game feed
custom_expected:
THEN
The Recap or Condensed Game feed will launch

title: MLB.TV Monthly
custom_preconds:
Given the build has been uploaded to Google Alpha
and has been installed
custom_steps:
When the At Bat Monthly user then accesses the MLB.tv paywall
And purchases MLB.tv Monthly successfully
And then links to a MLB account on the "Connect Purchase" screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will have access to MLB.tv and Gameday Audio
And the user will not see Lite ads
And the MLB account will display both purchases and entitlements in the CS Tool

title: Reinstall
custom_preconds:
Given the build has been uploaded to Google Alpha
and has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user uninstalls the build
And reinstalls the build
And accesses a paywall
custom_expected:
The App should automatically restore the purchase for the user (see successful toast message)
Then the user's purchases (At Bat Monthly and MLB.tv Monthly) will be restored
And the user can dismiss the "Connect Purchase" screen
And the user will have At Bat and MLB.tv access

title: Install on Second Device
custom_preconds:
Given the build has been uploaded to Google Alpha
and has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user installs the build on another device
And launches the app
And accesses a paywall
And logs in with their MLB account (FROM STEP 2)
custom_expected: Then the user will have access to At Bat and MLB.tv

title: Scoreboard Tab
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed and the user is on the Scoreboard Tab
custom_steps: When the user swipes between dates on the Scoreboard Date Picker
custom_expected: Then the view is smooth and no blinking and all data loads

title: Videos
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed and the user is on the Videos Tab
custom_steps: When the user changes teams with the team picker and scrolls around the videos
custom_expected: Then the view is smooth and no blinking and all data loads

title: Scoreboard (Highlighted)
custom_preconds:
Given a user has At Bat installed and user is observing a live game
or a strung game in QA
custom_steps: When the user is highlighting the game
custom_expected: The game data will update accordingly with Score, Pitcher, and Batter

custom_steps_separated.expected: Inning including States, Linescore including RHE, Count, Outs, Basepaths
Inning (including States), Linescore including RHE, Count, Outs, Basepaths, Pitcher, Batter
RHE, Count, Outs, Pitcher, Batter, Inning (including States)

title: Scoreboard (Not Highlighted)
custom_preconds: When the user is on the Scoreboard Tab and there is a game in the Live state or a strung game in QA
custom_steps: When the game is not highlighted
custom_expected: Then the data will update accordingly and the game will show Inning, Score, Count, Outs, Basepaths

title: Game Feed - Linescore
custom_preconds: Given the user is watching a game feed
custom_steps: When the user has the Game Info open on the Linescore Tab
custom_expected: Then the Linescore including RHE will updaye accordingly

title: Game Feed - Boxscore
custom_preconds: Given the user is watching a game feed
custom_steps: When the user has the Game Info open on the Boxscore Tab
custom_expected: Then the Boxscore for Batting and Pitching will update accordingly

title: Game Feed - Today's Games
custom_preconds: Given the user is watching a game feed
custom_steps: When the user has the Game Info open on the Today's Games Tab
custom_expected: Then the data will update accordingly with Inning, Score, Outs, Basepaths

title: Premium Feed Change
custom_preconds: Given the user has an entitled Premium MLB.TV Account and the user is currently watching one team's feed of a game
custom_steps: When the user switches to the other teams feed of the game
custom_expected: Then the user should see not be blocked from seeing the feed and the feed begins playing

title: Premium Blackout
custom_preconds:
Given the user has a entitled Premium MLB.TV account
*NOTE: For STB Blackout testing only - this needs to be done outside the MLB Network due to issues with redirect.  Options include testing from home or connecting to a mobile hotspot.
custom_steps: When the MLB.TV Premium user taps on a feed that is blacked out
custom_expected:
Then the Media Framework check appears
and the blackout message appears

title: Single Team Feed Change
custom_preconds: Given the user has a Single-Team entitled MLB.TV Account
custom_steps: When the user is watching a game feed from their team and switches to the other team's feed
custom_expected:
Then the Media Framework check appears
and the single team message appears restricting them from watching the feed

title: Scoreboard Feed
custom_preconds: Given the user account is not entitled
custom_steps: When the user selects a game feed
custom_expected: Then the user will see a MLB.TV Paywall

title: Free Game of the Day
custom_preconds: Given the user is not signed in
custom_steps: When the user clicks on the Free Game of the Day
custom_expected: Then the user will see the login screen with Free Game messaging

title: Settings Menu
custom_preconds: Given the user is not signed in
custom_steps: When the user opens the Settings menu
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a Purchase MLB.TV upsell button
that launches the MLB.TV paywall
